# mars: Pure Python MARS Implementation

Welcome to the documentation site for **mars**, a pure Python implementation of Multivariate Adaptive Regression Splines (MARS) with applications in health economics.

## About

mars provides a scikit-learn compatible implementation of the MARS algorithm, making it accessible to Python data scientists and researchers without the installation complexities of C/Cython implementations.

## Paper

Read our paper detailing the implementation and applications in health economics: [mars Paper](mars-paper.qmd)

## Key Features

- Pure Python implementation of the MARS algorithm
- Full scikit-learn compatibility
- Support for categorical variables and missing data
- Feature importance calculations
- Cross-validation utilities
- Interpretability tools including partial dependence plots
- Planned JAX backend for enhanced performance
